original_text: (Moses had given land in Bashan to half the tribe of Manasseh. But Joshua had given land on the west side of the Jordan to the other half of the tribe, as he did for the other tribes.) When Joshua sent the 2½ tribes home, he blessed them.
korean_text: 므낫세 반 지파에게는 모세가 바산에서 기업을 주었고 그 남은 반 지파에게는 여호수아가 요단 이쪽 서쪽에서 그들의 형제들과 함께 기업을 준지라 여호수아가 그들을 그들의 장막으로 돌려보낼 때에 그들에게 축복하고

sentences.original_text: Moses had given land in Bashan
to half the tribe of Manasseh
But Joshua had given land on the west side of the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여호수아는 요단강 서쪽에 땅을 주었다

sentences.original_text: to the other half of the tribe
as he did for the other tribes
When Joshua sent the 2½ tribes home
